name: Yasakani no Magatama
introduction: Yasakani no Magatama can protect people from disasters and allow people to obtain divine blessings. Coordinates the growth of all things, represents the sun and the moon and is bestowed by Izanami.

awakening_skills.name: Vibrating Jade Charm
awakening_skills.description: Increase the coefficient of P.DMG by 15%, enemies under the state of [Stun] reduce DEF by 40% for 1 round

awakening_skills.name: Yata no Kagami
awakening_skills.description: Enemies under the state of [Ignite] will lose 4% of self Max HP for 4 rounds.

awakening_skills.name: Twilight
awakening_skills.description: Speed+100, Buff Hit Probability+10% (Valid ONLY in Arena, Clash of Titans, Glory Arena, Clash of Guilds, Olympus Legend, Gods Twilight, and friends battle)
